a.title: NJ Student Assistance Counselor of the Year

img.alt: Photo: Gale Mangold, Student Assistance Counselor of the Year

div.div: NJ Student Assistance Counselor of the Year
Mrs. Gale Mangold, Pascack Hills Student Assistance Counselor (SAC) was named the 2019-2020 New Jersey SAC of the Year.
VIEW MORE About NJ Student Assistance Counselor of the Year

a.title: Holocaust Writing Contest Student Award Winners

img.alt: Photo: Holocaust Writing Contest Student Award Winners

div.div: Holocaust Writing Contest Student Award Winners
Students at both Pascack Hills and Pascack Valley received awards honoring their writing for the Sister Rose Thering Fund Essay Competition.
VIEW MORE About Holocaust Writing Contest Student Award Winners

a.title: 90 Students Earn the Seal of Biliteracy!

div.div: 90 Students Earn the Seal of Biliteracy!

12th grade students from both Pascack Hills and Pascack Valley High School will earn the NJ Department of Education Seal of Biliteracy. Students demonstrated a high level of proficiency in multiple languages such as Chinese, French, Italian, Korean, Polish, Russian and Spanish! Also, these students are newly eligible for the Global Seal of Biliteracy.
VIEW MORE About 90 Students Earn the Seal of Biliteracy!

p.span: To create a culture of innovation, inquiry, and individuality that promotes achievement and choice by cultivating the skills needed to compete and collaborate as ethical and responsible global citizens.

p.span: To prepare our students for successful college and/or career experiences with the needed mindset, skills, structures, and knowledge to accomplish that goal.
